fe.title: SENIOR FRONT-END DEVELOPER
summary: Senior Front-End Developer with 7 years of professional experience with JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.JS, Svelte, building high-performance web applications for E-commerce, Healthcare, FinTech, and Web3.
During my career, I was working in product, start-ups and outsourcing companies. Worked in diverse teams, as solo-developer and a team-leader.

Passionate about clean code, mentoring, and solving business challenges through technology. Collaborating with teams across Europe and North America. I really enjoy solving complex technical problems, designing scalable systems

skills.Frontend: React, Next.js, Svelte, SvelteKit, PWA, SSR, SSG, JSR, Redux, Zustand, MobX, RTK Query, TanStack Query, HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, D3.js, Web Components, Framer Motion, UI Libraries, Figma, Responsive Design, Mobile-First, Cross-Browser Compatibility, Web Accessibility (a11y), Lazy Loading, Code Splitting

jobs.title: Senior Front-End Developer
jobs.project: A Web3 platform for launching and automating airdrop campaigns.
achievements: Achieved 95+ Lighthouse scores across performance, accessibility using SvelteKit SSR
Delivered real-time UI tracking of 100K+ wallets and smart contract activity
Optimized performance: boosted TTFB by 25% with Cloudflare and reduced query latency by 40%
responsibilities: Developed and optimized UI using SvelteKit and component-based design
Integrated blockchain data via Ethers.js and The Graph
Focused on accessibility, responsiveness, and performance tuning
jobs.technologies: React, Next.js, Svelte, SvelteKit, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Clerk, Cloudflare, Web3, The Graph, PostgreSQL, Tailwind UI

jobs.title: Senior Front-End Developer, Team Leader
jobs.project: A Web3 E-commerce platform enabling brands to launch and manage NFT-based campaigns.
achievements: Implemented basic 3D visualizations on interactive maps using Google Maps API and Three.js to display user activity and NFT campaign distribution
Integrated Web3 wallets (Metamask, WalletConnect) into NFT flows with 10K+ item support
Delivered sub-second SSR load times with Next.js and advanced caching strategies
responsibilities: Provided technical leadership and mentorship for two junior engineers
Built feature-rich and scalable UI with Next.js and TypeScript
Integrated real-time blockchain data and wallet connection flows
jobs.technologies: Next.js, React, Redux, TypeScript, Web3.js, WalletConnect, Metamask, IPFS, Azure, Jest, Sentry, Ant Design, Google Maps API, Three.js

jobs.title: Front-End Developer

responsibilities: Delivered new features and UI improvements
Worked closely with designers to implement UX refinements
